description: Conversion of linked 1st floors of 20 and 22 to form a self contained flat. Layout alterations to ground floor at 20 to create fully separate access from street to upper floors. Replacement of existing metal shopfront to ground floor unit at 20 with timber shopfront.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:

Unnumbered A4 site location plan; Existing layout plan 1104/100; 1003/3 (existing front elevation), 1003/4 (existing and proposed rear elevation), 1003/5 (proposed 1st floor layout plan) and 1003/5 (proposed front elevation); Design and Access statement (LBI Registered No. 03601)

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
